imdb.plot outline: Due to the rise of drug overdoses in the United States and Iran, a rare alliance was made between the two countries to start the International Drug Enforcement Agency (IDEA). This agency was created to stop the heroin coming into these two countries from the poppy fields of Afghanistan.
imdb.title: Tehrangeles
plot: _Tehrangeles_ (qv) is a portmanteau deriving from the combination of Tehran and Los Angeles. The first Persian-American buddy cops TV show.::Peace keeper

Due to the rise of drug overdoses in the United States and Iran, a rare alliance was made between the two countries to start the International Drug Enforcement Agency (IDEA). This agency was created to stop the heroin coming into these two countries from the poppy fields of Afghanistan.::Kris Kardash, Ross Pagni, Yarett Harper and Farhad Khorasani
